Itunes uploaded the wrong episode yesterday which I uploaded in good faith as I don't watch the show and didn't know it wasn't the latest..I submitted a support request and was told they would look into it and check back in a few weeks!! I guess they don't want to spend their precious hundreds of billions of dollars swapping one file for another.I'm in the process of tracking down another copy of the show
